document.full_text: the boston bruins earned a berth in the stanley cup finals with a 1-0 victory over the tampa bay lightning on friday night in game 7 of the eastern conference finals.
document.title: bruins 1, lightning 0: by smallest of margins, bruins seal finals spot
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins earned a berth in the stanley cup finals with a 1-0 victory over the tampa bay lightning on friday night in game 7 of the eastern conference finals.
